name: Medusa (Ony)
description:
Rules are simple : avoid medusa as long as possible!

Controls are Z Q S D and arrow keys to move during the game

-> There is only one level, just survive

In upcoming releases this game will have a challenging coin system and waves of little minions we can fight. It will be exported on mobile as well.

If You have any problem launching the game, feel free to tell me.

Enjoy !
